Headline: Blue Line Experiencing Delays at Damen
ShortDescription: Blue Line service running w/delays due to Fire Department Activity at Damen; board all trains on the O'Hare-bound side between Western and Damen.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service running w/delays due to Fire Department Activity at Damen; board all trains on the O'Hare-bound side at Damen.

Trains, in both directions, are running on the same track between Western and Damen stations..

Board/exit all trains on the O'Hare-bound side of the platform between Western and Damen stations.

We're working to restore normal service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare- bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare- bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Division. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare- bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Division. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
